Necross/ Splattercannon:
 
"Soon, we will destroy the Maximals and achieve a great victory for Unicron.  Onward!"
Necross' battlecry sent shivers up his own spine, and then he and Splattercannon dove forward, heading straight for the Maximals' base.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
DarkFate:


"Then we should be ready"hissed the male"Show will start soon"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Necross/ Splattercannon:
>  
> "It will take a minute or two to enter the atmosphere and then it 
should be easy to find their base in no time."
> Necross, true to his word.  The minions completed re- entry and 
soon Necoss broke away from Splattercannon.  He flew along side 
Splattercannon at a slow pace, both waiting for the other three to 
catch up then they could all go and fight.
>  
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Darkfate:
> 
> 
> Darkfate and the others bots followed them.
> 
> 
> "We will arrive soon???"hissed Darkfate to the Leader
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > The minions pile out of the airlock into the void of space.  
Down 
> below was the planet Earth, and on the surface were their enemies, 
> the Maximals.  Splattercannon transformed into his gunship mode, 
> Necross manuvered to where he was directly above the ship and 
> Splattercannon began to enter the atmosphere.  As the heat began 
to 
> build up, Necross cast a glance over his shoulder to see if he 
> others were following.
> 
> 
> "Souls!  Give your strength!  Give me your power!  Strike your 
revenge with Omni- Savior Slash!" -Victortegon the Angel of 
Darkness' Destruction
>
